fullText: The Kite Runner is an undeniably moving story, but this Broadway adaptation feels more like an expensive audiobook than a fully realized piece of theater.
dtliExcerpt: The Kite Runner is an undeniably moving story, but this Broadway adaptation feels more like an expensive audiobook than a fully realized piece of theater.
